Cloud Backup
Photos Backup Videos Backup Documents Backup Miscellaneous Backup Audios Backup
Cloud Backup
If you end up losing or damaging your Smartphone tomorrow, what would you do? No worries, you always have the option to back-up your photos, videos, music and important documents on a cloud backup service. Using a cloud back-up service, your backed-up data can always be restored in cases of such unfortunate situations. Store your stuff in Dropbox and securely access your files from anywhere. Dropbox basic account provides users with 2GB of free storage.
Packed full of new and exclusive features! Vault Encryptor Pro

Our Apps
How to lock photos
1. Lock photo(s) from within the Locker.\nA. Open desired album.\nB. Tap on the (+) icon, you can lock from\ni) Device’s Gallery,\nii) Camera\niii) Private browser.\n\ni) Device’s Gallery:\nA. Tap gallery icon.\nB. Select desired gallery albums or select desired photos in gallery album.\nC. Tap the Lock button given in top bar to lock selected photo(s).\n\nii) Camera:\nA. Tap camera icon.\nB. Take a snap and tap save button.\n\niii) Private Browser:\nA. Tap private browser icon and browser will open.\nB. Long tap on a photo and select “Save image” and the photo will be locked directly in the app.
2. Lock photos from gallery by using the ‘share’ function.\nA. Select the photo(s) in gallery you wish to lock.\nB. Tap on the ‘Share’ icon.\nC. Now select “Vault Encryptor”.\nD. Select destination album.
How to lock videos
1. Lock video(s) from within the Locker.\nA. Open desired album.\nB. Tap on the (+) icon, you can lock from\ni) Device’s Gallery,\nii) Camera, \niii)Private browser.\n\ni) Device’s Gallery:\nA. Tap gallery icon.\nB. Select desired gallery albums or select desired video(s) in gallery album.\nC. Tap the Lock button given in top bar to lock selected video(s).\n\nii) Camera:\nA. Tap camera icon.\nB. Record a video and tap save button.\n\niii) Private Browser:\nA. Tap private browser icon and browser will open.\nB. Download the desired videos. Downloaded video will be locked directly in the app.
2. Lock videos from gallery by using the ‘share’ function.\nA. Select the video(s) in gallery you wish to lock.\nB. Tap on the ‘Share’ icon.\nC. Now select “Vault Encryptor”.\nD. Select destination album.
How to lock Photos/Videos with in App’s gallery
A.Tap on the (+) icon.\nB.Select photo or video icon.\nC.Select desired gallery albums or select desired photo(s)/video(s) in gallery album.\nD.Tap the Lock button given in top bar to lock selected photo(s)/video(s).
How to add secured contact(s) in Contacts
1.Create contact(s) from within the Vault Encryptor.\nA.Open desired folder.\nB.Tap on the (+) icon.\nC.Add contact details and tap Save button on top bar.\n2.Add contact from Phone contacts.\nA.Open desired folder.\nB.Tap Phone Contacts from top bar.\nC.Select contact(s) and tap Import button on top bar.
How to send private SMS to locked contact(s)
A.Open desired folder.\nB.Tap SMS button on top bar.\nC.Select contact(s) and tap SMS button on top bar.\nD.Now enter SMS message and tap Send.
How to create secret note(s) in Notes
A.Open desired Folder.\nB.Tap on the (+) icon.\nC.Enter title and note’s content.\nD.Add voice recording by tapping Mic icon, also listen saved recording by tapping Play icon.\nE.Change note’s color by tapping Color button at top bar, select desired color and tap OK.\nF.After all, tap Save button on top bar to save the note.
How to add audio file(s) in Audios
A.Open desired folder.\nB.Tap on the (+) icon, you can lock from\ni)Phone storage, \nii)Private browser.\ni)Phone Storage:\nA.Tap Phone Storage icon.\nB.Select desired folder or select desired audio(s) in folder.\nC.Tap the Lock button given in top bar to lock selected audio(s). \n\nii)Private Browser:\nA.Tap private browser icon and browser will open.\nB.Download the desired audios. Downloaded audios will be locked directly in the app. \n
How to add document file(s) in Documents
A.Open desired folder.\nB.Tap on the (+) icon, you can lock from\ni)Phone storage.\nii)Private browser.\n\ni)Phone Storage:\nA.Tap Phone Storage icon.\nB.Select desired folder or select desired file(s) in folder.\nC.Tap the Lock button given in top bar to lock selected file(s).\nii)Private Browser:\nA.Tap private browser icon and browser will open.\nB.Download the desired document file. Downloaded files will be locked directly in the app.
How to add miscellaneous file(s) in Miscellaneous
A.Open desired folder.\nB.Tap on the (+) icon, you can lock from\ni)Phone storage.\nii)Private browser.\n\ni)Phone Storage:\nA.Tap Phone Storage icon.\nB.Select desired folder or select desired file(s) in folder.\nC.Tap the Lock button given in top bar to lock selected file(s).\n\nii)Private Browser:\nA.Tap private browser icon and browser will open.\nB.Download the desired file. Downloaded files will be locked directly in the app.
How to create card(s) in Wallet
A.Open desired folder.\nB.Tap on the (+) icon.\nC.Select card type.\nD.Fill in the required details and tap Save.
How to unlock or delete File(s)
Long tap any file, edit mode will be open.\nA.Tap Delete to permanently delete selected file(s).\nB.Tap Unlock to unlock selected file(s).\nC.Tap Move and select the destination folder, by this selected file(s) will move to the desired folder.\nD.Tap Share to share selected file(s) to different social media(s).
How to set stealth mode
A.Tap Stealth Mode icon.\nB.Activate Stealth Mode.\nC.The app’s launcher icon will now disappear from device’s apps list.\nD.To open the app, just dial *6666 and press call from device’s dialer.
How to sync data on cloud
A.Open Cloud feature.\nB.Select Photos/Videos/Audios/Documents/Notes.\nC.Their folders will appear, showing number of files to upload or to download.\nD.Tap sync button to sync the device and cloud data.\nE.Now your data is safe on cloud; if your data gets removed from your device then you can restore it from cloud again.

To Activate Locked App Using The Thumb Scanner: Tap twice on the App Lock’s Logo, then long tap on the thumb scanner. To activate locked app using error message: Tap twice on the error message text, then long tap on “OK” button located below the text.
